name: Orbem Explore
storyline:
Just your average tech genius and sword-fighting enthusiast, inventing a device that could unlock the universe…or lead to its total destruction.

After a decade of research and development, I've done it. I've created a personal wormhole transportation device, a feat that should have been the pinnacle of my career.

But all my excitement turns to horror when I realize my boss is willing to kill to get his hands on my invention. Suddenly, the groundbreaking device I created becomes a deadly weapon, and the only way to survive is to use it.

In a desperate bid to escape the clutches of my ruthless boss, I make a split-second decision to transport myself and three colleagues to another universe – Orbem.

Orbem greets us with a host of fantastical challenges. From tyrannical Elves to racist lizard humanoids, and even rabid Pixies, survival in this magical realm demands every ounce of our knowledge and skill.

And with a dark sorcerer threatening our very existence, I still have to find a way back home and thwart my CEO's sinister plans before and save Earth.

Explore the universe inspired by the novel series "The Homonian Chronicles" as you visit landmarks and meet various characters from the books.
summary: A pixel art RPG game where you can walk around the fictional universe "Orbem" based on The Homonian Chronicle Hard Sci-Fi / Fantasy novel series written by Scott V. Adrian.
